    CustomizationManagementApi.CreateSearchCustomizationAdapter
    createSearchCustomization(com.here.platform.data.client.base.ols.generated.scaladsl.model.search.InlineObject inlineObject, Optional<String> xRequestID)
    Create a Places search customization that enables HERE Search use cases including user-owned Places (POI) content.
    A customization consists of one or more datasets and zero or more views.

    A Places customization dataset is a resource you can insert, update, delete Places content to, and query that data using HERE Search APIs.

    A Places customization view is a resource that defines a low-level query template referring to pre-existing dataset resources along with filtering and combination rules over those resources.

  • Method Details

    • createSearchCustomization

      public CustomizationManagementApi.CreateSearchCustomizationAdapter createSearchCustomization(com.here.platform.data.client.base.ols.generated.scaladsl.model.search.InlineObject inlineObject, Optional<String> xRequestID)
      Create a Places search customization that enables HERE Search use cases including user-owned Places (POI) content.
      A customization consists of one or more datasets and zero or more views.

      A Places customization dataset is a resource you can insert, update, delete Places content to, and query that data using HERE Search APIs.

      A Places customization view is a resource that defines a low-level query template referring to pre-existing dataset resources along with filtering and combination rules over those resources. A view may not be written to. A view's HERE Resource Name (HRN) may be used in the datasets query parameter on HERE Search APIs.

      Path: /customizations

      Method: POST

      Expected answers:

      code 201 : CustomizationCreateOrUpdateResponse (New resource has been created.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      code 207 : CustomizationCreateOrUpdateResponse (New resource has been partially created) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      code 400 : Error (The server cannot or will not process the request due to an apparent client error.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      code 401 : UnauthorizedError (The HAPI Gateway has returned an unauthorized authentication error.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      code 403 : UnauthorizedError (Insufficient rights to perform the request.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      code 409 : Error (The request could not be completed due to a conflict.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      code 504 : Error (The server has timed out.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      Parameters:
      inlineObject -
      xRequestID - The uuid string user can provide for tracing purpose.

    • deleteSearchCustomization

      public CustomizationManagementApi.DeleteSearchCustomizationAdapter deleteSearchCustomization(String customizationHrn, Optional<String> xRequestID)
      Deletes an existing search customization by its CustomizationHrn.

      Path: /customizations/{customizationHrn}

      Method: DELETE

      Expected answers:

      code 204 : String (An empty response as a result of a user-request with an accepted MIME type application/x-empty.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      code 401 : UnauthorizedError (The HAPI Gateway has returned an unauthorized authentication error.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      code 403 : UnauthorizedError (Insufficient rights to perform the request.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      code 404 : Error (The requested resource was not found.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      code 504 : Error (The server has timed out.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      Parameters:
      customizationHrn - The unique HRN identifier of a search customization.
      xRequestID - The uuid string user can provide for tracing purpose.

    • listSearchCustomizations

      public CustomizationManagementApi.ListSearchCustomizationsAdapter listSearchCustomizations(Optional<String> xRequestID, Optional<Boolean> linkable, Optional<String> pageToken, Optional<Integer> limit)
      Returns all search customization definitions by available to the requesting principal.

      Path: /customizations

      Method: GET

      Expected answers:

      code 200 : InlineResponse200 (The HTTP request was successful.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      code 400 : Error (The server cannot or will not process the request due to an apparent client error.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      code 401 : UnauthorizedError (The HAPI Gateway has returned an unauthorized authentication error.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      code 403 : UnauthorizedError (Insufficient rights to perform the request.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      code 404 : Error (The requested resource was not found.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      code 504 : Error (The server has timed out.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      Parameters:
      xRequestID - The uuid string user can provide for tracing purpose.
      linkable - Indicates if the response should return the list of linkable customization resources.

      If set to 'false' (default), then the response will contain the customizations that are homed in the project in the token's project scope If set to 'true', then the response will contain the customizations that are available to the caller to link to the project in the token's project scope
      pageToken - If specified, the implementation should return the specific page based on the token.

      Not recommended to be used directly; it is usually provided as part of the response when pagination is necessary (see pageToken in GetAllCustomization200).
      limit - Number of results to return per page.

      code 400 : Error (The server cannot or will not process the request due to an apparent client error.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      code 401 : UnauthorizedError (The HAPI Gateway has returned an unauthorized authentication error.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      code 403 : UnauthorizedError (Insufficient rights to perform the request.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      code 409 : Error (The request could not be completed due to a conflict.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      code 504 : Error (The server has timed out.) Headers : X-Correlation-ID - X-Request-ID -

      Parameters:
      customizationHrn - The unique HRN identifier of a search customization.
      inlineObject1 -
      xRequestID - The uuid string user can provide for tracing purpose.
